body:
openmpi should depend on the compiler used by the wrappers.  I managed to gc the one built into the wrappers.
I can't immediately see how to get it into the dependencies, but I assume it's simple.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

Build openmpi with a new compiler, uninstall that compiler, and try to run mpicc.

### Information on your system

Spack v0.16.0, openmpi commit 77b2e578ec47f7713cae965fede1ab6e60aa69c4

### Additional information

@hppritcha
title: Installation issue: openmpi
